title: handful of nuts
information: Rich in healthy fats and magnesium, they support brain health and promote satiety throughout the day.

title: bowl of oats
information: Provides complex carbohydrates and fiber, offering sustained energy and stabilizing blood sugar levels.

title: avocado toast
information: Packed with monounsaturated fats and fiber, it supports brain function and keeps you fuller for longer.

title: yogurt with honey
information: A good source of probiotics and natural sugars — supports digestive health and provides a mild energy boost.

title: soy milk latte
information: A creamy plant-based alternative to dairy that supplies protein and may support heart health.

title: grilled salmon
information: Rich source of omega-3 fatty acids, which support heart, brain, and joint health.

title: scrambled eggs
information: High in protein and essential nutrients like choline, which aid brain function and muscle repair.

title: 2 liters of water
information: Staying hydrated improves focus and overall mood.

title: 2 dark chocolate cubes
information: Flavonoids can enhance blood flow to your brain, boosting mental clarity and reducing stress.

title: a banana
information: Packed with potassium, it supports muscle function and helps prevent cramps.

title: a glass of green tea
information: Contains L-theanine and caffeine — a combo that improves alertness and enhances calm focus without the jitters.

title: fresh strawberries
information: Rich in antioxidants like vitamin C, they help fight oxidative stress and support skin and immune health.

title: carrot sticks
information: Crunchy and full of beta-carotene, they support eye health and provide a satisfying, low-calorie snack.
